dhp209-220:210: Mā piyehi samāgañchi,appiyehi kudācanaṁ;Piyānaṁ adassanaṁ dukkhaṁ,appiyānañca dassanaṁ.
dhp209-220:211: Tasmā piyaṁ na kayirātha,piyāpāyo hi pāpako;Ganthā tesaṁ na vijjanti,yesaṁ natthi piyāppiyaṁ.
dhp209-220:212: Piyato jāyatī soko,piyato jāyatī bhayaṁ;Piyato vippamuttassa,natthi soko kuto bhayaṁ.
dhp209-220:213: Pemato jāyatī soko,pemato jāyatī bhayaṁ;Pemato vippamuttassa,natthi soko kuto bhayaṁ.
dhp209-220:214: Ratiyā jāyatī soko,ratiyā jāyatī bhayaṁ;Ratiyā vippamuttassa,natthi soko kuto bhayaṁ.
dhp209-220:215: Kāmato jāyatī soko,kāmato jāyatī bhayaṁ;Kāmato vippamuttassa,natthi soko kuto bhayaṁ.
dhp209-220:216: Taṇhāya jāyatī soko,taṇhāya jāyatī bhayaṁ;Taṇhāya vippamuttassa,natthi soko kuto bhayaṁ.
dhp209-220:217: Sīladassanasampannaṁ,dhammaṭṭhaṁ saccavedinaṁ;Attano kamma kubbānaṁ,taṁ jano kurute piyaṁ.
dhp209-220:218: Chandajāto anakkhāte,Manasā ca phuṭo siyā;Kāmesu ca appaṭibaddhacitto,Uddhaṁsototi vuccati.
dhp209-220:219: Cirappavāsiṁ purisaṁ,dūrato sotthimāgataṁ;Ñātimittā suhajjā ca,abhinandanti āgataṁ.
dhp209-220:220: Tatheva katapuññampi,asmā lokā paraṁ gataṁ;Puññāni paṭigaṇhanti,piyaṁ ñātīva āgataṁ.
